pages.text: 44|19|Va [niz] ʙar Alloh taolo ʙartari macued, ki man ʙarojaton daleli ravsane ovardaam
44|20|Va az in ki sangsoram kuned, ʙa Parvardigori xud va Parvardigori sumo panoh meʙaram
44|21|Agar ʙa man imon nameovared, pas, az man kanora ʙigired [va rahojam kuned]
44|22|On goh ʙa dargohi Parvardigoras duo kard, ki: «[Bor iloho] Inon guruhe taʙohkorand»
44|23|[Ba Muso vahj kardem, ki] «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar, zero [sipohi Fir'avn] sumoro ta'qiʙ xohad kard
44|24|Va darjoro orom pusti sar ʙiguzor, ki onon sipohe hastand ki ƣarq xohand sud
44|25|Ci ʙisjor ʙoƣhovu casmasorhoro, ki raho kardand [va raftand]
44|26|Va kistzorhovu qasrhoi naku [va zeʙo]
44|27|Va ne'mate, ki dar on [sodmon] ʙudand
44|28|[Sarnavistason] In guna [ʙud] va [tamomii] on ne'mathoro ʙa guruhe digar voguzostem
44|29|Osmonu zamin ʙar [noʙudii] onon qatrai aske narext va muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] niz najoftand
44|30|Be tardid, Bani Isroilro az azoʙi xorkunanda nacot dodem
44|31|Az Fir'avn, ki [rohʙari] sarkase dar zumrai isrofkoron ʙud
44|32|Mo ʙo donisi Xud Bani Isroilro ʙar mardumi zamona ʙartari dodem
44|33|Va nisonahoe [az qudrati xes] dar ixtijorason guzostem, ki ozmoise ravsan dar on ʙud
44|34|In musrikon megujand
44|35|«Cuz margi naxustini mo hec [zindagii digare] nest va hargiz ʙarangexta naxohem sud
44|36|Va agar rost megued, nijogonamonro [zinda kuned va] ʙijovared»
44|37|Ojo eson ʙehtarand jo qavmi [nerumandi] Tuʙʙa' va pesinijoni onho, ki cun ʙazahkor ʙudand, halokason kardem
44|38|Va Mo osmonu zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost ʙa ʙozica najofaridaem
44|39|Onhoro ʙa haq [va ʙo hadaf] ofaridaem, vale ʙestarason namedonand
